resources.string: The pre-downloaded font is used for this part to avoid the overhead of the time until the requested font is downloaded. See "src/main/res/font" directory for usage.

Typeface of this part is going to be changed when a new font is downloaded. To request a new font, fill the \"Family Name\" (and optionally change other attributes such as width, weight, italic), then tap the \"Request\" button
Font request failed with reason code: %1$d
